author: Special Correspondent
text:
Judges conducting Mega Lok Adalat at the District Court in Tiruchi on Saturday.— PHOTO: A. MURALITHARAN

A total of 112 cases were settled for Rs. 1.50 crore at the Lok Adalat conducted across five courts in the district on Saturday.

A lion’s share of compensation went to motor vehicle accident cases — 31 — resolving disputes accounting for Rs. 1. 04 crore. Civil disputes, numbering 63, were settled for Rs. 23.11 lakh and 15 pre-litigation cases were settled for Rs. 15.46 lakh.

S. Kumaraguru, Principal District Judge and chairman of the District Legal Services Authority, opened the event.

P. Parthasarathy, secretary of the authority, said it held in Tiruchi, Manapparai, Musiri, Lalgudi, and Thuraiyur.
title: 112 cases resolved at Lok Adalat
